q: CEO Steve Ballmer actually announced: Windows Phone 7 will become Nokia's primary smartphone platform Nokia will contribute to Windows Phone 7 hardware development( help Microsoft developers better optimize their software for telecom) Nokia will bring WP7 to a larger range of price points, market segments and geographies( translation: low-cost replacements for today's feature phones and more devices in the developing world) The Microsoft Marketplace( app and media store) will absorb Nokia's current apps and content( the Ovi store)

Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better. "Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added: "For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune."

"As the CEO of a biotechnology company, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand 's initiative is extremely important to us," said Dr. Joan Fallon, Curemark founder and CEO. By supporting cutting edge research in the biotechnology field, and thus allowing for innovation, these R&D tax credits will help to defray the costs of basic research and clinical programs, which can be prohibitive to the small biotech companies. We at Curemark are extremely grateful for the Senator's leadership on this issue. Senator Kirsten Gillibrand 's proposal would expand the current credit by changing the formula to provide greater incentive for companies such as Curemark to increase investment; simplify the current credit, which is highly complicated and

at an entire ecosystem of products. Also up in the air is how this agreement will impact each company's tablet strategies. A letter from Steve Ballmer and Stephen Elop on Nokia's Web site says, the battle is moving from one of mobile devices to one of mobile ecosystems. Any such ecosystem must include devices beyond smartphones. Internal reactions at Nokia were made apparent when an estimated 1000 employees "walked out" in protest to the announcement. as the Chrome web browser and the Google Inc. Android smartphone operating system. Android, one of Google Inc. 's biggest and most promising cash cows, last year overtook Apple's iOS as the best-selling mobile platform. It is important to note that although the titles have changed, the core team remains the same... this new team structure makes a lot of sense and could result in faster decision making, JP Morgan technology analyst Imran Khan said.
